name: pnp-list-formatting-likes-count-rowclass
title: Likes Count Row Class
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to change the background color of a row depending on the number of likes.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to change the background color of a row depending on the number of likes. In this case, the background color of the row changes when the number of likes is 2 or more.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
